divs: sighting detailsi went to the window & few min. later in the southern part of sky & very low over the lake , a flash caught my eye & i've looked in that area & there it showed up again & at extreme speed it went in a back & forth motion , like side to side (se to sw) . this repeated it self 5 times . wasn't rhythmic , more like 2 times i had to wait & see if it would re-appear again . after the last quick glide towards the west , it just stopped & while still looking in that direction , all of a sudden i in a nick of time saw on the left side of my eye a lot less weaker flush of light ball & than all was over . i've waited few minutes , but it has not reappeared . before writting this report here i have checked the maps of where exactly it must have been , & judging by the distance it must have been on the american side , somewhere over the pensilvania -ohio corridor . i'm sure someone there must have seen it as it was huge ! the size of the ball\flush light seemed to be as big as a moon . the aureola of the light or edge rim was very wide & a bit fuzzy . as for the distance it must have 'travelled' like this for many miles . this whole sighting lasted about 3-4 min, i estimate . have no idea of what it could have been . while looking at this i felt some pressure at the temples but i think it was due to my trying to keep up with it as to not losing it from my view , plus it was in the middle of the night . time it happened was at approx. 12:35 am - 12:38 am. no photos available .
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around April 17th 2010
Summary: Strange very large white flash light going back & forth , as if looking for something , in a low horizon perhaps 25* angle to the horizon & over the lake but it looked much much further as if over the Lake Erie on the US side (direct South).
